results.title: Potential Benefits of Combined Statin and Metformin Therapy on Resistance Training Response in Older Individuals
results.text_hl: We present secondary statin analyses of data from the MASTERS trial where @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ blunted the @<m>DISEASE_Hypertrophy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006984 @@@hypertrophy@@@ response in healthy participants (>65 years) following 14 weeks of progressive resistance training (PRT) when compared to identical placebo treatment (n = 94).

citations.NLM: Long DE, Kosmac K, Dungan CM, Bamman MM, Peterson CA, Kern PA. Potential Benefits of Combined Statin and Metformin Therapy on Resistance Training Response in Older Individuals Front Physiol. 2022;13():872745. PMID: 35492586

results.title: Combination Effects of Metformin and a Mixture of Lemon Balm and Dandelion on High-Fat Diet-Induced Metabolic Alterations in Mice
results.text_hl: Histopathological analyses revealed that the @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ combination ameliorated the @<m>DISEASE_Hypertrophy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006984 @@@hepatic hypertrophy@@@/@DISEASE_Fatty_Liver @DISEASE_MESH:D005234 @@@steatosis@@@, pancreatic endocrine/exocrine alteration, @CHEMICAL_Fats @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005223 @@@fat@@@ tissue @<m>DISEASE_Hypertrophy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006984 @@@hypertrophy@@@, and @DISEASE_Fatty_Liver @DISEASE_MESH:D005234 @@@renal steatosis@@@, more than either monotherapy.

citations.NLM: Choi JY, Jang TW, Song PH, Choi SH, Ku SK, Song CH. Combination Effects of Metformin and a Mixture of Lemon Balm and Dandelion on High-Fat Diet-Induced Metabolic Alterations in Mice Antioxidants (Basel). 2022 Mar 18;11(3):. PMID: 35326230

results.title: Effect of metformin on left ventricular mass and functional parameters in non-diabetic patients: a meta-analysis of randomized clinical trials
results.text_hl: @DISEASE_Hypertrophy_Left_Ventricular @DISEASE_MESH:D017379 @@@Left ventricular hypertrophy@@@ is a common finding in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Myocardial_Ischemia @DISEASE_MESH:D017202 @@@ischemic heart disease@@@ and is associated with mortality in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Cardiovascular_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D002318 @@@cardiovascular disease@@@ (@DISEASE_Cardiovascular_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D002318 @@@CVD@@@). @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@, an antidiabetic drug, has been shown to reduce oxidative stress and left ventricular mass index (LVMI) in animal @<m>DISEASE_Hypertrophy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006984 @@@hypertrophy@@@ models.

citations.NLM: Kamel AM, Sabry N, Farid S. Effect of metformin on left ventricular mass and functional parameters in non-diabetic patients: a meta-analysis of randomized clinical trials BMC Cardiovasc Disord. 2022 Sep 10;22(1):405. PMID: 36088302

results.title: Novel Targets of Metformin in Cardioprotection: Beyond the Effects Mediated by AMPK.
results.text_hl: Clinical data suggest the direct effects of this drug on cardiac metabolism and studies in animal models showed that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ activates the classical pathway of @GENE_PRKAB1 @GENE_5564 @@@AMP-activated protein kinase@@@ (@GENE_PRKAB1 @GENE_5564 @@@AMPK@@@), generating cardioprotective effects during @DISEASE_Ventricular_Remodeling @DISEASE_MESH:D020257 @@@cardiac remodeling@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Hypertrophy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006984 @@@hypertrophy@@@ and @DISEASE_Fibrosis @DISEASE_MESH:D005355 @@@fibrosis@@@.

citations.NLM: Bolívar S, Noriega L, Ortega S, Osorio E, Rosales W, Mendoza X, Mendoza-Torres E. Novel Targets of Metformin in Cardioprotection: Beyond the Effects Mediated by AMPK. Curr Pharm Des. 2021;27(1):80-90. PMID: 32386485

results.title: Morphological and functional characterization of diabetic cardiomyopathy in db/db mice following exercise, metformin alone, or combination treatments.
results.text_hl: In conclusion, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ improved changes in the morphology and structure of the heart and aorta, while exercise alone or in combination with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ demonstrated more advantages in cardiac functional reserve through the physiological @<m>DISEASE_Hypertrophy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006984 @@@hypertrophy of myocardium@@@ in @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ db/db @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@.

results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ also generated more prominent improvement in left ventricular (LV) diastolic function and @<m>DISEASE_Hypertrophy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006984 @@@hypertrophy@@@.

Next, to examine the effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on @GENE_EP300 @GENE_2033 @@@p300@@@-mediated @<m>DISEASE_Hypertrophy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006984 @@@hypertrophy@@@, cardiomyocytes were transfected with expression vector of @GENE_EP300 @GENE_2033 @@@p300@@@.
